Elizabeth:WildCardPower.NAME: Arcana Swapped
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer use Wild Card this turn.

Elizabeth:FoolPower.NAME: Fool
DESCRIPTIONS: The next
Arcana cards have their Bonus enabled.
The Fool Arcana does not mean that it can be taken lightly. The Fool is number zero. It is the void from which all other things begin.

Elizabeth:MagicianPower.NAME: Magician
DESCRIPTIONS: Attaining one's dream requires a stern will and unfailing determination.

Elizabeth:PriestessPower.NAME: Priestess
DESCRIPTIONS: The silent voice within one's heart whispers the most profound wisdom.

Elizabeth:EmpressPower.NAME: Empress
DESCRIPTIONS: Celebrate life's grandeur...its brilliance...its magnificence...

Elizabeth:EmperorPower.NAME: Emperor
DESCRIPTIONS: Only courage in the face of doubt can lead one to the answer...

Elizabeth:HierophantPower.NAME: Hierophant
DESCRIPTIONS: It is indeed a precious gift to understand the forces that guides oneself...

Elizabeth:LoversPower.NAME: Lovers
DESCRIPTIONS: There is both joy and wonder in coming to understand another...

Elizabeth:ChariotPower.NAME: Chariot
DESCRIPTIONS: One of life's greatest blessings is the freedom to pursue one's goals.

Elizabeth:JusticePower.NAME: Justice
DESCRIPTIONS: To find the one true path, one must seek guidance amidst uncertainty...

Elizabeth:FortunePower.NAME: Fortune
DESCRIPTIONS: Alongside time exists fate, the bearer of cruelty.

Elizabeth:StrengthPower.NAME: Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: Only with strength can one endure suffering and torment.

Elizabeth:HangedManPower.NAME: Hanged Man
DESCRIPTIONS: In the face of disaster lies the opportunity for renewal.

Elizabeth:DeathPower.NAME: Death
DESCRIPTIONS: The moment man devoured the fruit of knowledge, he sealed his fate... Entrusting his future to the cards, man clings to a dim hope. Yes, the Arcana is the means by which all is revealed... Beyond the beaten path lies the absolute end. It matters not who you are... Death awaits you.

Elizabeth:TemperancePower.NAME: Temperance
DESCRIPTIONS: True happiness can be found in the acceptance of others.

Elizabeth:AuthorityPower.NAME: Authority
DESCRIPTIONS: Applying a #yDebuff will Down this enemy.

Elizabeth:DownedPower.NAME: Downed
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy takes 25% more damage and cannot act this turn. Become Undowned at the start of next turn.
